project_descr: Strategic Planning and Action to Climate Resilience of Rural Communities in Nusa Tenggara Timur Province (SPARC)

outputs.output_descr: SPARC project with support from GEF/Special Climate Change Fund (GEF/SCCF) funding will focus on strengthening and developing climate resilient institutions and rural communities around livelihoods, food and water security.
